entries.entry: we're slowly learning how to work in groups. it's been fun.
started javascript. really happy to get going on that. stoked to get real confused.
started objects today. remembered I need to make sure I pay really close attention to small details and not get too tripped up when I don't get it the first time

Just had the BIGGEST breakthough in my understanding of how fetching objects works. I had made fetching from two APIs and appending them to the DOM work, but I didn't understand how. Brenda sat down with me and talked me through what I did, which led to me realizing how easily I could manipulate an object that I've grabbed by even ADDING to it from ANOTHER API! WHAT?!?! So cool.
